sn35.75:4.3: “amukasmiṃ, bhante, vihāre aññataro bhikkhu navo appaññāto ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35.75:4.4: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn35.75:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā navavādañca sutvā gilānavādañca, “appaññāto bhikkhū”ti iti viditvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami.
sn35.75:5.2: Addasā kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn35.75:5.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35.75:5.8: Nisajja kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35.75:5.9: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.75:6.1: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn35.75:6.2: na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn35.75:7.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35.75:8.1: “Na khvāhaṃ, bhante, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35.75:9.1: “No ce kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi, atha kimatthaṃ carahi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn35.75:10.1: “Anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35.75:11.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
sn35.75:11.3: Anupādāparinibbānattho hi, bhikkhu, mayā dhammo desito.
sn35.75:12.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, bhikkhu, cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.75:14.9: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.75:16.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.75:18.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35.75:20.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati … pe …
sn35.75:20.5: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.75:20.9: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35.75:21.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn35.75:21.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhussa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccīti.
